text: Miss Susan looked at her pityingly and said, "In the name of heaven, madame," replied Monte Cristo. #Twitter

passages.fragment: Miss Susan looked at her pityingly and said , ``
passages.full_quote: <used>Miss Susan looked at her pityingly and said, "Y</used>ou never know what's going to happen in thirty seconds?"

passages.fragment: and said , `` In the name of
passages.full_quote: If at this moment the sweet voice of Renée had sounded in his ears pleading for mercy, or the fair Mercédès had entered <used>and said, "In the name of</used> God, I conjure you to restore me my affianced husband," his cold and trembling hands would have signed his release; but no voice broke the stillness of the chamber, and the door was opened only by Villefort's valet, who came to tell him

passages.fragment: `` In the name of heaven , madame , ''
passages.full_quote: "<used>In the name of heaven, madame," sa</used>id Villefort, "where is the doctor"
"This I do not comprehend; and yet I may not ask for an explanation, <used>madame," replied Monte Cristo</used> bowing
